name: Tinker
title: Boush
lore: A brilliant inventor, Boush uses his gadgets to overwhelm enemies with relentless ability spam.

laserTinker.name: Laser
laserTinker.description: Fires a laser that damages and blinds enemies, causing them to miss attacks.

heatSeekingMissiles.name: Heat-Seeking Missiles
heatSeekingMissiles.description: Launches missiles at the nearest enemy heroes, dealing damage.

defense_matrix.name: Defense Matrix
defense_matrix.description: Shields an ally, granting barrier and status resistance.

rearm.name: Rearm
rearm.description: Channels to reset the cooldowns of all abilities and items.
